That's correct, also add finance.

arguments.subject: Your Personalized News Digest – September 1, 2025
arguments.body:
## Your Daily News Digest

1. **[AI breakthroughs in 2025](https://techcrunch.com/2025/09/01/ai-breakthroughs)**
   Researchers unveiled next‑generation transformer models that dramatically improve language understanding and generation, promising faster AI services across industries.

2. **[New electric car battery technology](https://www.theverge.com/2025/09/01/electric-battery)**
   A new solid‑state battery prototype offers twice the driving range and half‑hour charging, positioning electric cars as a viable alternative to gasoline vehicles.

3. **[UN climate summit outcomes](https://www.climatechangenews.com/2025/09/01/un-summit-outcomes)**
   At the UN climate summit, countries committed to net‑zero emissions by 2050 and introduced a $100 billion fund for renewable infrastructure.

4. **[Global markets rally amid tech earnings](https://www.ft.com/content/2025-09-01-tech-earnings)**
   Global markets surged as leading tech firms reported record earnings, suggesting a strong outlook for technology‑driven investments.

5. **[Conflict in East Asia escalates](http://feeds.bbci.co.uk/news/world-asia-12345678.rss)**
   Tensions rose in East Asia after recent military maneuvers, prompting calls for diplomatic engagement to avoid economic disruption.

Happy reading! 🎉
